mapper.select: SELECT hd.no, hd.dong, hd.AptName, hd.code, hd.dealAmount, hd.buildYear, hd.dealYear, hd.dealMonth, hd.dealDay, hd.area, hd.floor, hd.jibun, hd.type, hd.rentMoney, hi.lat, hi.lng, hi.img FROM housedeal hd INNER JOIN houseinfo hi ON hd.AptName = hi.AptName and hd.dong = hi.dong WHERE hd.code = #{dongcode} and hd.dong = #{dong}
